alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 24 at 1:40PM MST until November 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 7500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Chuska Mountains above 7500 feet, including Buffalo Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Buffalo Pass 5 to 9 inches
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
